content.rendered:
About Us

Welcome To York Street Spa,

Your sanctuary of relaxation and rejuvenation located in the heart of the ByWard Market in Ottawa. At York Street Spa, we are dedicated to providing you with a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Our mission is to enhance your well-being by offering a wide range of spa and salon services that cater to your unique needs.

What Sets Us Apart

Aveda Lifestyle Salon and Spa

We take pride in being an Aveda Lifestyle Salon and Spa, committed to using environmentally friendly products that not only benefit you but also contribute to the well-being of our planet.

Customized Spa Services

We understand that every individual is unique, and our approach reflects that. Our skilled service providers are here to tailor your spa experience to your specific needs, whether you're seeking relaxation, stress relief, or beauty enhancement.

Professional and Caring Team

Our team of experienced estheticians, therapists, and stylists are dedicated to exceeding your expectations. We aim to provide you with the highest level of care, ensuring your comfort and satisfaction.

Environmentally Conscious

We are mindful of the products we use and their impact on the environment. Our commitment to eco-friendly practices reflects our dedication to sustainability and responsible living.

Seven-Day Availability

To accommodate your busy schedule, we are open seven days a week. Whether it's a weekday escape or a weekend indulgence, we're here to serve you.

At York Street Spa, our goal is to aid in reaching your physiological, emotional, and spiritual peak. We believe in nurturing growth, both within our Ottawa spa team and in the world we live in. We invite you to experience the ultimate in relaxation and well-being at York Street Spa.

History Story + Take a Tour

Our journey at York Street Spa has been a remarkable one, filled with dedication to wellness, beauty, and exceptional experiences. We invite you to join us on a tour of our spa’s history, where you’ll discover our commitment to providing a sanctuary of relaxation and rejuvenation.

York Street Spa was founded with a vision to create a haven in the heart of the ByWard Market in Ottawa. Our story is one of passion for wellness and beauty, and it all began with the desire to offer a unique and eco-friendly spa experience. Step back in time and explore how we evolved into an Aveda Lifestyle Salon and Spa, dedicated to using environmentally friendly products that benefit both you and our planet.

As you take a virtual tour of our spa’s history, you’ll come to understand the values and principles that drive us. Discover our dedication to personalized care, eco-consciousness, and excellence in service. York Street Spa is more than just a spa; it’s a place where well-being meets sustainability.

Contact Us

At York Street Spa, we value open communication with our clients. If you have any questions, inquiries, or need assistance with booking appointments, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us. We're here to provide you with all the information you need to enhance your spa experience.

Opening & Closing Times + Map

We understand that convenience matters when planning your spa visit. To assist you in planning your visit, we provide our opening and closing times, ensuring you can schedule your appointments at your convenience. Additionally, our map offers you clear directions to our spa, making it easy for you to find your way to relaxation.

Customer Reviews/Testimonials

The experiences of our valued clients speak volumes about the quality of service and care we provide at York Street Spa. We take great pride in our customer reviews and testimonials, as they reflect the satisfaction and happiness of those who have chosen us for their spa and beauty needs. Explore what others have to say about their time at York Street Spa, and let their experiences inspire your own journey to relaxation and rejuvenation.

Team

Meet the York Street Spa Team

At York Street Spa, our team is the heart and soul of our sanctuary of relaxation and rejuvenation. Comprising dedicated professionals who are passionate about wellness, beauty, and exceptional service, we take pride in introducing you to the individuals who make our spa experience truly special.

Salon Team

Our talented hairstylists are skilled in creating the perfect look to complement your style and personality. From cuts and styles to coloring and updos, they have a keen eye for trends and a dedication to their craft, ensuring that you leave our salon feeling and looking your best.

Spa Team

Our team of estheticians is here to address your unique skincare needs. With extensive training and a commitment to enhancing your natural beauty, they provide a range of advanced facial treatments, body therapies, and more.

Massage Team

Our licensed massage therapists are trained in various techniques to provide you with the ultimate relaxation and relief. Whether you're seeking a traditional Swedish massage or a specialized treatment, they have the expertise to address your specific needs.

Support Team

Our friendly front desk team is here to make your spa experience seamless, from booking your appointments to answering your questions. They are your first point of contact and are dedicated to ensuring your visit is a pleasant one.

Cosmetic Injector

If you're considering cosmetic injectables, our skilled cosmetic injector is here to provide you with expert guidance and services that enhance your natural beauty.

Eco-Conscious Professionals

York Street Spa takes pride in its commitment to environmentally friendly practices. Our team is dedicated to using eco-conscious products and promoting sustainability in all aspects of our spa operations.

Get to know our team better by exploring their profiles and backgrounds. We’re excited to introduce you to the individuals who are dedicated to making your spa experience exceptional.

Career

Join Our Team at York Street Spa

Are you passionate about beauty, wellness, and providing exceptional service? If so, York Street Spa could be the perfect place for you to build your career in the spa and salon industry. We are always on the lookout for talented individuals who share our commitment to excellence, eco-consciousness, and creating memorable experiences for our clients.

Why Choose a Career at York Street Spa:

Eco-Friendly Environment

York Street Spa is an Aveda Lifestyle Salon and Spa, dedicated to using environmentally friendly products that benefit both our clients and the planet. If you're passionate about sustainability, you'll feel right at home here.

Professional Growth

We believe in nurturing the growth of our team members. At York Street Spa, you'll have opportunities for professional development and advancement in your career.

Exceptional Team

Join a team of skilled and caring professionals who are committed to exceeding our clients' expectations. You'll find a supportive and collaborative work environment that fosters creativity and innovation.

Client-Centered Service

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. If you're dedicated to providing personalized care and creating memorable experiences, you'll thrive in our spa.

Flexibility

We understand the importance of work-life balance. York Street Spa offers flexible scheduling options to accommodate your lifestyle.

If you’re ready to embark on a fulfilling career in the spa and salon industry and share our values, we encourage you to explore our current job openings and consider joining our team. We look forward to welcoming dedicated professionals who are passionate about wellness and beauty.

Blog

Discover the Latest Trends and Wellness Tips in Our Spa Blog

Welcome to the York Street Spa blog, your go-to source for all things beauty, wellness, and relaxation. We’re excited to share our insights, tips, and the latest trends in the spa and salon industry with you. Whether you’re looking for skincare advice, hairstyling tips, or information about our spa services, you’ll find it all here.

Stay Informed

Our blog is your destination for staying informed about the latest developments in the world of beauty and wellness. From skincare routines to haircare trends, we cover a wide range of topics to help you look and feel your best.

Expert Advice

Our team of experienced professionals, including estheticians, hairstylists, and massage therapists, will share their expert advice and recommendations. You'll learn about the best practices for maintaining healthy skin, achieving your desired hairstyle, and finding relaxation through spa treatments.

Special Offers

Don't miss out on our special offers and promotions. We'll keep you updated on exclusive deals and discounts, so you can make the most of your spa experience.

Whether you’re a spa enthusiast or just curious about what our spa has to offer, our blog is here to inspire and inform you. We invite you to explore our articles, join the conversation
